name: Goblin Stone
summary: Overadventuring has wiped out 90% of the goblins in the wild. Lead these goblins in a desperate struggle to reverse their fate through this turn-based RPG crafted in charming hand-drawn 2D style.
info:
• 中文名: 哥布林之石
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: RPG
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2022年1月
  • 官方网站: https://www.orcchopgames.com/
  • 开发商: Orc Chop Games
  • 发行: Orc Chop Games
